October 2007 BUGLE
bugle-frontbuffer 7
bugle-frontbuffer force rendering to the front buffer
filterset frontbuffer
Description
The frontbuffer filter-set overrides the draw buffer, setting it to GL_FRONT. This is most useful when used within &mp-gldb-gui; in order to see how a scene is built up batch by batch.
Bugs
As with any filter-set that modifies OpenGL state, it may break complex rendering techniques like render-to-vertex-buffer.
